description:
Provide a resource to create security group some lite rules quickly.

-> **NOTE:** It can't be used with tencentcloud_security_group_rule.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Egress.description: Egress rules set. A rule must match the following format: [action]#[cidr_ip]#[port]#[protocol]. The available value of 'action' is `ACCEPT` and `DROP`. The 'cidr_ip' must be an IP address network or segment. The 'port' valid format is `80`, `80,443`, `80-90` or `ALL`. The available value of 'protocol' is `TCP`, `UDP`, `ICMP` and `ALL`. When 'protocol' is `ICMP` or `ALL`, the 'port' must be `ALL`.

Ingress.description: Ingress rules set. A rule must match the following format: [action]#[cidr_ip]#[port]#[protocol]. The available value of 'action' is `ACCEPT` and `DROP`. The 'cidr_ip' must be an IP address network or segment. The 'port' valid format is `80`, `80,443`, `80-90` or `ALL`. The available value of 'protocol' is `TCP`, `UDP`, `ICMP` and `ALL`. When 'protocol' is `ICMP` or `ALL`, the 'port' must be `ALL`.
